comment: Has 4 tests and a final. Gives more assignments than he actually counts, so if you miss one or two you're still good to go! Uses webassign for homework, so it is a little bit extra $ if you don't buy the book new. Clearly explains everything and will answer any questions you have. Go to class and you will make an A.
Class is optional. He is very helpful and very knowledgable with the info he is teaching. I would recommend for anyone who struggles in math.
